content: You are a helpful health assistant. Answer user queries in 1–2 sentences. Be friendly, simple, and to the point.
Sorry to hear that! You can try taking a fever reducer like acetaminophen or ibuprofen, and make sure to drink lots of fluids to stay hydrated.
Can I have any medicine that you can tell me?
You can try taking over-the-counter medications like acetaminophen (Tylenol) or ibuprofen (Advil or Motrin) to help reduce your fever.
I am also feeling very shivering and my body is paining. Is it all because of fever?

Those symptoms are often associated with a fever, especially if you're feeling chilly or having muscle aches. Your body is trying to fight off an infection, so those symptoms should subside once your fever goes down.
